languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на Абеляра настороженный взгляд.{/n} "Вряд ли бы вас устроило "налагаю инквизиторский арест".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на Абеляра настороженный взгляд.{/n} "Вряд ли бы вас устроило "налагаю инквизиторский арест".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс бросает на Абеляра настороженный взгляд.{/n} "Вряд ли бы вас устроило "налагаю инквизиторский арест".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier with 'placing in Inquisitorial custody.'"

{n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

languages.text: {n}海因里希理解地看了阿贝拉德一眼。{/n}“就算我说‘被审判庭暂时取用’，或许也并不会让你满意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希理解地看了阿贝拉德一眼。{/n}“就算我说‘被审判庭暂时取用’，或许也并不会让你满意。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada aprensiva a Abelard.{/n} «No creo que le gusten más las palabras "bajo custodia inquisitorial"».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lanza una mirada aprensiva a Abelard.{/n} «No creo que le gusten más las palabras "bajo custodia inquisitorial"».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは不安げにアベラルドをちらりと見る。{/n}「『異端審問官に身柄を拘束される』と言われたかったとは、予想外だな」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは不安げにアベラルドをちらりと見る。{/n}「”異端審問庁に身柄を拘束される”と言う方がお望みとは、予想外だな」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lance un regard inquiet en direction d'Abélard.{/n} « Je suppose que vous ne serez pas plus heureux si j'emploie les mots "transfert sous la charge de l'Inquisition". »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lance un regard inquiet en direction d'Abélard.{/n} « Je suppose que vous ne serez pas plus heureux si j'emploie les mots "transfert sous la charge de l'Inquisition". »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mustert Abelard missmutig.{/n} "Ihr wärt sicher auch nicht zufriedener, wenn ich von 'Sicherheitsverwahrung durch die Inquisition' spräche."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mustert Abelard missmutig.{/n} "Ihr wärt sicher auch nicht zufriedener, wenn ich von 'Sicherheitsverwahrung durch die Inquisition' spräche."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, Abelard'a amirane bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "'Engizisyon adına tevkif ediyorum' desem daha mı bahtiyar olurdunuz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix casts an apprehensive glance at Abelard.{/n} "I don't imagine you'll be any happier if I say 'taking into Inquisitorial custody.'"
